titleStmt.title: The regiment of the pouertie. Compiled by a learned diuine of our time D. Andreas Hyperius. And now seruing very fitly for the present state of this realme. Translated into Englishe by H.T. minister
titleStmt.author: Hyperius, Andreas, 1511-1564.
Tripp, Henry, d. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: By F. Coldock, and H. Bynnneman [sic],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
